Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
